game.controller

Class FriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.controller.FriendController

  • public class FriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    A FriendController responds to commands by FriendMenu and execute these commands on the entity

      • sendRequest

        public int sendRequest(java.lang.String username)
        Attempts to send request to the specified player. Sending a request may cause several errors, returning various error codes as follows 0 - Success 1 - No player with that username exists 2 - Player is already a friend 3 - Player cannot send friend request to himself 4 - There is already a pending request between user and the player he is trying to friend
        Parameters:
        username -
        Returns:
        the error code
